TFM’s Chrome extension is for those who like European brands and shopping without borders in genuine European shops! 

With TFM’s Chrome extension, transborder shopping has become more alluring than ever before, with better prices and additional discounts.

ADDITIONAL DISCOUNT IN ANY SHOP WITH ONE CLICK
In addition to all your discounts from any retailer, we provide you with an additional perk by helping to buy without VAT.

SEE THE REAL PRICE 
Given TFM’s unique technology, you can see the price without VAT for any item in any European shop and pay without VAT. 

EVERYRHING IN ONE CART 
You can save all your items from all shops in one place and check out or continue shopping at any time.
